commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Now that you're back, Emma, it seems like this will really work out!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I didn't quit in the first place, but, you know!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Look at you, worrying people like that! Harrumph!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Are you anyone to taaalk?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Ahh!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Anyway, that aside. Let's talk about getting the last former member back in the club!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Setsuna Yuki, right?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What kind of person is she?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Hm, wellll... She's hard to sum up in a word, and the details...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: The details...?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: The details make me want to sleep.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Let's share few enough to keep you awake, then.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'm sure you already know this, but Setsuna called the shots around our club.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: She was like a dump truck with a cute face.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A cute dump truck...

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: She was the most motivated of us, and since she'd been a solo school idol, she was pretty famous.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'd heard of her, too. I was really surprised that someone so famous joined our club!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wow, Kasumi, you really know your stuff when it comes to school idols.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I've got to nip potential rivals in the bud—er, rather, I want to pick up a lot of promising hopefuls for the group!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, she sounds like she'd really stand out, but...I haven't heard a thing about her around school.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yeah, really.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I know she's in Nijigasaki, but I've never seen her anywhere but the club.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'd always run into her when going to school idol live shows before, but she hasn't been in any of those lately.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wait, could she have...quit being an idol?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: No way. She loved school idols from the bottom of her heart, so there's no way she'd quit.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: She really wanted to spread her love all over the world, so I can't help but think that she's hiding.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Setsuna was amazing. She was so good at singing and dancing. And her proportions were great.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oh-hoh! Speaking of proportions! I remembered there was a girl I wanted to invite to the club! Let's get her before we look for Setsuna!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What's she like?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Apparently she's an...amateur model in magazines.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Oh really?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'll call her!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Hmm... School idols, huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: How about being a school idol with us? You'll have lots of fun, guaranteed!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I see. Well, I've gotten a lot of invitations, but never to the school idol club. But...could I pull it off?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course you could! You look like a model, so I think costumes would look amazing on you!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: ...Feeling relieved, Kasumi?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: ...No. Just thinking about how unfair god is.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Hmm... It does sound interesting, but...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Th-Then?!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Are you sure you want me, though? Frilly dresses and stuff don't agree with me. I'm pretty good with tight-fitting or revealing stuff, though.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: R...Revealing?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yeah, like...costumes that show off the moles on my chest the girl next to you keeps glancing at.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I-I'm not looking at anything!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Kasumi, you...just admitted it.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: B-But I just thought she was so pretty, and... Uwah...

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Giggle* Thanks for the compliment.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Sure, I'll be a school idol, but I have one condition.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I want to become my own type of school idol. Is that all right? I'll join the club, but I guess you could say that I don't work too well in groups.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ahh, I see! That's it! That's perfect!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nijigasaki's school idol club won't force its members to work as a group!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Kasumi, you said that school idols can go solo, right?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: R-Right.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And Shizuku, you said it was cool how everyone wanted to do different things, right?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yeah...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I think things fell apart last time because you forced yourselves to work as a group too much - even though everyone's really unique and has things they all want to do.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So what if we all came together as a group, but we all tried to become our own ideal school idols?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We'd both compete with and help each other. Wouldn't that type of club be perfect for us?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We don't have to all go in the same direction. Everyone can go down the path they want to!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Hey, that sounds great. I'm for it.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: ...You mean we don't need act as a group?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, we'll try things. We don't have to act as a group, or act alone all the time. How about we work on our strengths and interests?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Karin, please, work with us to become exciting school idols like there's never been before!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Like there's never been before, huh? Heh, sounds interesting. I'll join up, then.
